text: The 1903 Alabama Crimson Tide baseball team represented the Alabama Crimson Tide of the University of Alabama in the 1903 college baseball season, winning the SIAA championship.2009 Baseball Media Guide, p. 102 ==References== Alabama Category:Alabama Crimson Tide baseball seasons Category:Southern Intercollegiate Athletic Association baseball champion seasons Category:1903 in sports in Alabama
title: 1903 Alabama Crimson Tide baseball team
